info.name: Discord Ninja Extreme Compact Adaptive (NECA)
info.description: Compact theme for clear view or stealh-using Discord chat as a widget in a small browser window. Good compatibility with all window sizes and standart discord themes. Automatic resize of elements. Also will be useful for the owner of a large amount of discord servers with the unique scroller for an invite-to-server context menu.
info.additionalInfo: Discord grows up every day and changes, please contact if you found some new issues. Last update: - the authorization panel size fixed - detail image and video preview fixed - adaptive size for thin and tall browser window fixed - size of numeric mention mark fixed - text-size of member playing activity fixed - typing animation in private channels fixed - message group became more compact - text input became compact too - missing ability to change status returned - "Wampus is typing..." returned
